eu.slipo.athenarc.triplegeo.utils

Class BatchReverseConverter

  • java.lang.Object
    • eu.slipo.athenarc.triplegeo.utils.BatchReverseConverter

  • public class BatchReverseConverter
extends Object
    Recreates a disk-based RDF graph and extracts its contents through a user-specified SELECT query in SPARQL. Results can be written to a typical geographical files (currently supported: CSV and ESRI Shapefiles). The attribute names in the SELECT query will become the column names in the resulting files.
    Version:
    1.4
    Author:
    Kostas Patroumpas

      • queryModel

        public void queryModel(String sparql,
                       ReverseConverter conv)
        Submits a SPARQL query and evaluates it against this model.
        Parameters:
        sparql - A SELECT query in SPARQL against the RDF graph. Syntax must comply will the ontology of the model.
        conv - A ReverseConverter object that will apply the reverse transformation against the results of the query.
